description:
Versatile overalls that are up for living life on the rugged side. Cut for movement with a gusseted crotch and articulated knees, they are a natural pick for urban adventures.

  • Burly nylon with a bit of stretch stands up to camp life
  • Side seam snap closure with faux fly
  • Plenty of pockets hold treasures and snacks
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees give you room to move
  • PFC-free DWR finish keeps them looking presentable
  • Fair trade certified. Your purchase of this item supports better working conditions for the factory workers who made it. For each product sold, they earn a premium to increase their earnings and fight poverty in their communities
name: MEC Burly Camp Overalls - Children
